Historical Roadmap

Historial GoAhead Roadmap

This roadmap is no longer maintained. Please consult GitHub GoAhead Milestones for a current roadmap.

The GoAhead roadmap is created by listening to user input. As such, it is subject to change. This roadmap is not a commitment to product, but reflects our current thinking about future directions. Those who shout the loudest — often get what they ask for. To request a feature, please send email to: dev@embedthis.com

Release Schedule

As with all good open source, our release schedule is driven by software readiness rather than by commercial needs. Nevertheless, here is an outline of our current best estimate.

Release Date
Embedthis GoAhead 3.3.4 July 2014 (est)
Embedthis GoAhead 3.3.3 June 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.3.2 May 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.3.1 March 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.3.0 February 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.2.1 January 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.2.0 January 2014
Embedthis GoAhead 3.1.3 November 2013
Embedthis GoAhead 3.1.2 September 2013
Embedthis GoAhead 3.1.1 April 2013
Embedthis GoAhead 3.1.0 March 2013
Embedthis GoAhead 3.0.0 October 2012
